Text: You shouldn't say things like go fuck yourself to ignorant bigots like zakimar, it just makes them feel like their hate is justified. The reason why they love to say things like propaganda when referring to the holocaust is because it's inconvenient for them. To people who believe in antisemitic ideologies the holocaust is a big black eye on their whole belief system. They argue that antisemitism should be an acceptable and mainstream ideology, and yet if you carry it to it's logical conclusion, that being a state based upon the ideals of antisemitism you end up with the holocaust, and only an extremist would consider that to be an acceptable solution. Since there is no way to argue that this is acceptable, at least not to the vast majority of people, they just close their eyes, plug their ears and claim it never happened. Just be happy that the chances of such ideologies ever making it into mainstream state policy in the western world again is pretty low.
